jobs.title: Marketing & Communications Manager
jobs.description:
Swapsy is the world’s first dedicated fashion swapping app that enables people to exchange clothing and accessories with people local to them, while helping people meet others with similar interests. We’re a growing startup made up of a team of six down to earth people who wear many different hats!

In June 2019 we will be launching Swapsy on Android / iOS and our aim is to drive interest, downloads and engagement. We are looking for a Marketing & Communications Manager to help us take Swapsy to the next level. Within this role you will be given the freedom and responsibility to do what you think works best for Swapsy (although we do have some ideas!).

As a Marketing & Communications Manager you will:
Based in London (this is not a remote role)
Interest in developing marketing campaigns and communications
Share Swapsy at Meetups, events and other conferences
Collaborate with the Social Media Manager to develop social media ideas and content
Establish, maintain and grow relationships with fashion and environmental groups
Attend technology and start-up networking events

We’re looking for:
Someone who is proactive and a self starter
Ability to collaborate effectively with the rest of the team when needed to input 
Develop our marketing and communication roadmaps
Someone who is comfortable with ambiguity and changing timelines

Bonus points if you have:
A passionate for circular economy, sustainable fashion and zero waste :)


This role is for a few hours a week or more. It could be great for someone looking to grow their CV, experience and test their ideas. Plus you get to work with an experienced team!

This is an unpaid position with the possibility of a paid opportunity and/or equity as the business grows.

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.description:
Swapsy is a fast growing startup based in London, UK. We are the world’s first dedicated fashion swapping app that allows people to exchange clothing and accessories with people local to them. The app will be ready to download for Android and iOS in June 2019 and right now, our aim is to drive interest, downloads and engagement. We’re a team of six down to earth people who care about the environment and creating a great product for our users. 

We’re looking to recruit an awesome Social Media Manager a quickly growing startup to help take us to the next level. There’s a ton of flexibility and exploration. And as with any startup, you’ll wear many different hats and will be given the freedom and responsibility to do what you think works best for Swapsy. You’ll be working directly with the Head of Product Design and Chief Marketing Officer. 

As Social Media Manager you will:
- Brainstorm and create engaging social media campaigns that are consistent with the Swapsy’s brand and mission
- Help us craft communications and messaging
- Manage and own the social media post roadmap
- Ability to attend events on a regular basis with us to take photos and engage with our users on social

Requirements:
- Based in London, UK
- 5-10 hours/week (this may fluctuate from week to week)
- Creatively minded with ideas about how we can engage people on social
- Proficiency with Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest
- Collaborative and has great communication skills
- Proactive and a self starter
- Willingness to try new things and campaigns
- Great organizational skills
- Ability to collaborate effectively with the rest of the team when needed to input 
- Comfortability with ambiguity and changing timelines

Bonus points if you have:
- Enthusiasm and excitement for fashion
- A passion for circular economy, sustainable fashion and zero waste :)

This is an unpaid position and could be great for someone looking to gain experience for their CV and test their ideas. We can also provide a recommendation/reference letter (if you are a student and are looking to get experience!)

Feel free to check out our social media pages to get a feel for us
Instagram: @swapsy
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/swapsyapp
Twitter: https://twitter.com/swapsy_app

jobs.title: Visual Designer
jobs.description:
Swapsy is a fast growing app startup based in London, UK. We are the world’s first dedicated fashion swapping app that allows people to exchange clothing and accessories with people local to them. The app will be ready to download for Android and iOS in June 2019 and right now, our aim is to drive interest, downloads and engagement. We’re a team of six down to earth people who care about the environment and creating a great product for our users. 

We’re looking to recruit a Visual Designer for a quickly growing startup to help take us to the next level. Visual design at Swapsy touches on graphic design, illustration and photography. There’s a ton of flexibility and exploration. And as with any startup, you’ll wear many different hats and will be given the freedom and responsibility to do what you think works best for Swapsy. You’ll be working directly with the Social Media Manager, Head of Product Design and Chief Marketing Officer. 

As a Visual Designer you will:
- Create graphic design assets for print (business cards, posters, flyers, etc.) 
- Design digital design / branding assets (social media, website, etc.)
- Collaborate with the Social Media Manager Intern to brainstorm ideas for social media campaigns
- Help us design email templates for newsletters, etc.
- Re-design our website (this is on our wish list!)

Requirements:
- Based in London, UK
- 8-10 hours/week (this may fluctuate from week to week)
- A current design student or junior designer who is looking to gain design experience
- Creatively minded with awesome visual design skills
- Proficiency with Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator and/or InDesign
- Animation / video creation skills a definite plus!)
- Collaborative and has great communication skills
- Proactive and a self starter
- Willingness to try new ideas of what we could do in terms of design
- Ability to collaborate effectively with the rest of the team when needed to input 
- Comfortability with ambiguity and changing timelines

Bonus points if you have:
- Enthusiasm and excitement for fashion
- A passion for circular economy, sustainable fashion and zero waste :)

This is an unpaid position and could be great for someone looking to gain experience for their CV and test their ideas. We can also provide a recommendation/reference letter (if you are a student and are looking to get experience!)

Feel free to check out our social media pages to get a feel for us
Instagram: @swapsy
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/swapsyapp
Twitter: https://twitter.com/swapsy_app
